## Source: ossf-package-analysis (626c10f0486b04cda2d813bc50241e0676d4ab679f376a6922b10d61c961dfcb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'wp-delivery-hero-core-v2' @ 2.2.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
